query:
-- Insert 3 tents
INSERT INTO tents (id, name, tentType, width, depth, height, volume, powerW, createdAt) VALUES
(90001, 'Estufa A - Mãe/Clones', 'INDOOR', 120, 120, 200, 2880, 300, NOW()),
(90002, 'Estufa B - Vegetativo', 'INDOOR', 150, 150, 200, 4500, 600, NOW()),
(90003, 'Estufa C - Floração', 'INDOOR', 200, 200, 220, 8800, 1000, NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name);

-- Insert sample strain
INSERT INTO strains (id, name, type, description, createdAt) VALUES
(1, 'OG Kush', 'HYBRID', 'Strain clássica com alto THC', NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name);

-- Insert active cycles
INSERT INTO cycles (id, tentId, strainId, startDate, floraStartDate, status, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(1, 90001, 1, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), NULL, 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 90002, 1, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 21 DAY), NULL, 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 90003, 1, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 35 DAY), DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=VALUES(status);

-- Insert sample daily logs
INSERT INTO dailyLogs (tentId, logDate, turn, tempC, rhPct, ppfd, ph, ec, notes, createdAt) VALUES
(90002, CURDATE(), 'AM', 25.5, 65.0, 500, 6.0, 1.2, 'Tudo normal', NOW()),
(90003, CURDATE(), 'AM', 23.0, 55.0, 800, 6.2, 1.8, 'Flora semana 4', NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tempC=VALUES(tempC);
